sentence: Wall Street struggled to continue its winning ways on Thursday as gains driven by earnings news were constrained by more political turmoil in Washington and weakness in retailers.

The Nasdaq Composite and the S&P 500 were both heading for stronger finishes and new record highs, but with slimmer gains than earlier in the week as they spent most of the session trying to recoup losses made after a sharp selloff in the morning.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average was slightly weaker as Home Depot ( HD ) weighed.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
